name: .KWGT File Extension
summary: Learn about .KWGT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a KWGT file with KWGT Kustom Widget Maker (Android). First, place the file in the following directory on your Android device:
Then, open KWGT Kustom Widget Maker and import your KWGT file.
If you want to view the assets and JSON file a KWGT file contains, rename the file to use the .zip extension and open it as you would any ZIP file.
